      • doUpload

        public boolean doUpload(DODInstance instance,
               java.lang.String username,
               java.lang.String fileType,
               org.zkoss.zk.ui.event.UploadEvent event)
                 throws ConfigFileSizeException,
                        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException,
                        java.io.IOException
        Uploads a config file and creates the corresponding job to copy the file to the instance.
        Parameters:
        instance - instance to copy the config file to.
        username - requester of this job.
        fileType - type of config file to upload.
        event - upload event to get the data from.
        Returns:
        true if the creation of this job was successful, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        ConfigFileSizeException - if the file to be uploaded is too big.
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - if the enconding is not supported.
        java.io.IOException - if there is an error reading the file.

                java.lang.String username,
                DODSnapshot snapshot,
                java.util.Date pitrTime)
        Restore a backup for an instance.
        Parameters:
        instance - instance to restore the backup from.
        username - requester of this job.
        snapshot - snapshot to restore.
        pitrTime - offset to restore.
        Returns:
        true if the creation of this job was successful, false otherwise.
